review: I thought it would give me access to Netflix and all that stuff with just Wi-Fi but apparently I need my phone or laptop to use netflix and then it'll play it on my TV.. Not what expected, basically wasted my money because I don't use it...

review: This is SUPER NICE,I LOVE my chromecast

review: I'm still working out how to cast media that isn't from the chrome browser, but that's my only gripe.

review: now that an update will arrive soon that will mirror screens i love it. as of 9-2014 i can mirror my tmobile htc one on it but not yet my 2013 nexus 7 but the update should fix that. its simple and easy to use. for $30 you cant go wrong..
